The `BulletinBoardWatcher` class is designed to monitor specific posts or their removals on a bulletin board system. When all specified events occur, it triggers a callback function. This utility class leverages event handling to efficiently track these occurrences without examining the content of the posts, providing a reliable way to synchronize actions based on board activity.

class BulletinBoardWatcher(DirectObject.DirectObject):
    """ This class allows you to wait for a set of posts to be made to (or
    removed from) the bulletin board, and gives you a notification when all
    posts have been made. Values of posts are not examined."""
    notify = DirectNotifyGlobal.directNotify.newCategory('BulletinBoardWatcher')
